casebody.data:
The NORTH CAROLINA STATE BAR
v.
Michael H. McGEE, Attorney. No. 406P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Michael H. McGee, Pro Se, for McGee. David R. Johnson, for State Bar.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 15th day of August 2007 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of October 2007."
